verses.kjv: The burden of Moab. Because in the night Ar of Moab is laid waste, and brought to silence; because in the night Kir of Moab is laid waste, and brought to silence;
verses.web: The burden of Moab. For in a night, Ar of Moab is laid waste, and brought to nothing. For in a night Kir of Moab is laid waste, and brought to nothing.
verses.ct: A message of judgment against Moab: In a single night, Ar of Moab is destroyed and reduced to nothing. In a single night, Kir of Moab is destroyed and reduced to nothing.

verses.kjv: He is gone up to Bajith, and to Dibon, the high places, to weep: Moab shall howl over Nebo, and over Medeba: on all their heads shall be baldness, and every beard cut off.
verses.web: They have gone up to Bayith, and to Dibon, to the high places, to weep. Moab wails over Nebo and over Medeba. Baldness is on all of their heads. Every beard is cut off.
verses.ct: The people go up to Bajith and to the high places of Dibon to weep. Moab wails over Nebo and Medeba. Every head is shaved bald, and every beard is cut off in mourning.

verses.kjv: In their streets they shall gird themselves with sackcloth: on the tops of their houses, and in their streets, every one shall howl, weeping abundantly.
verses.web: In their streets, they clothe themselves in sackcloth. In their streets and on their housetops, everyone wails, weeping abundantly.
verses.ct: In their streets they wrap themselves in sackcloth. On their rooftops and in their public squares, everyone wails, overcome with weeping.

verses.kjv: And Heshbon shall cry, and Elealeh: their voice shall be heard even unto Jahaz: therefore the armed soldiers of Moab shall cry out; his life shall be grievous unto him.
verses.web: Heshbon cries out with Elealeh. Their voice is heard even to Jahaz. Therefore the armed men of Moab cry aloud. Their souls tremble within them.
verses.ct: Heshbon and Elealeh cry out — their voices carry all the way to Jahaz. Even Moab's soldiers scream in anguish; their souls tremble with terror.

verses.kjv: My heart shall cry out for Moab; his fugitives shall flee unto Zoar, an heifer of three years old: for by the mounting up of Luhith with weeping shall they go it up; for in the way of Horonaim they shall raise up a cry of destruction.
verses.web: My heart cries out for Moab! Her nobles flee to Zoar, to Eglath Shelishiyah; for they go up by the ascent of Luhith with weeping; for on the way to Horonaim, they raise up a cry of destruction.
verses.ct: My heart breaks for Moab! Her refugees flee as far as Zoar, to Eglath Shelishiyah. They climb the road to Luhith, weeping as they go. On the road to Horonaim, they raise a desperate cry of destruction.

verses.kjv: For the waters of Nimrim shall be desolate: for the hay is withered away, the grass faileth, there is no green thing.
verses.web: For the waters of Nimrim will be desolate; for the grass has withered away, the tender grass fails, there is no green thing.
verses.ct: The waters of Nimrim have dried up. The hay has withered, the grass has failed, and nothing green remains.

verses.kjv: Therefore the abundance they have gotten, and that which they have laid up, shall they carry away to the brook of the willows.
verses.web: Therefore they will carry away the abundance they have gotten, and that which they have stored up, over the brook of the willows.
verses.ct: So the people grab whatever wealth they've saved up and carry it across the Brook of the Willows.

verses.kjv: For the cry is gone round about the borders of Moab; the howling thereof unto Eglaim, and the howling thereof unto Beerelim.
verses.web: For the cry has gone around the borders of Moab, its wailing to Eglaim, and its wailing to Beer Elim.
verses.ct: The sound of weeping echoes across Moab's borders — wailing reaches as far as Eglaim, and wailing reaches Beer Elim.

verses.kjv: For the waters of Dimon shall be full of blood: for I will bring more upon Dimon, lions upon him that escapeth of Moab, and upon the remnant of the land.
verses.web: For the waters of Dimon are full of blood; for I will bring yet more on Dimon, a lion on those of Moab who escape, and on the remnant of the land.
verses.ct: The waters of Dimon run red with blood, and I will bring still more upon Dimon — lions to hunt down those who escape from Moab and whoever remains in the land.
